function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Fluorescent lamp efficiency falling below 70% in uv-c range at low temperatures and airflow","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of community transmission control measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability of air change rates in different parks","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pandemics leading to an increase in robot adoption over time","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of dedicated covid-19 patient hospital infrastructure","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Embedding contextual information in 3d building models may lead to inaccurate risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implicit assumption that supply chains are not affected by major disruptions like covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Extended risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spread of covid-19 outbreak","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Handling enveloped viruses without proper chloroform
